column5: Quality Check - As per structural engineering plans Reinforcement size correct, spacing does not exceed maximum allowed, position within tolerance - As per structural engineering plans
Lap length and location acceptable - As per structural engineering plans

column3: Reo not cut/bent for ease of installation
column5: Reo not cut or bent for ease of installation

column3: All openings sufficiently trimmed/re-entry bars installed
